SKILL_NAME: the Dabble Lab birthday reminder skill
GREETING: Welcome to {}. What would you like to do?
GREETING_REPROMPT: What would you like to do?
ASK_NAME: Please tell me the first name of the person whose birthday you want to add.
ASK_NAME_REPROMPT: Tell me the first name of the person whose birthday you want to add.
ASK_DOB: Okay. Now please tell me {}'s date of birth.
ASK_DOB_REPROMPT: Please tell me their date of birth.
BIRTHDAY_SAVED: I've successfully saved the new birthday entry. What would you like to know?
BIRTHDAY_SAVED_REPROMPT: What would you like to know?
TELL_DOB: {}'s birthday is on <say-as interpret-as='date' format='md'>{}</say-as>. What else would you like to know?
TELL_DOB_REPROMPT: What else would you like to know?
TELL_NEAREST_DOB: {}'s birthday is coming up next and it is in {} days. What else would you like to know?
TELL_NEAREST_DOB_REPROMPT: What else would you like to know?
DELETE_ALL: I have successfully deleted all the birthday records. What would you like to do now?
DELETE_ALL_REPROMPT: What else would you like to do?
DELETE_SPECIFIC: I've successfully deleted {}'s birthday from the database. What would you like to do now?
DELETE_SPECIFIC_REPROMPT: What else would you like to do?
HELP: This skill demonstrates how to read, write, update and add delete attribute values from dynamo DB.
HELP_REPROMPT: This skill demonstrates how to read, write, update and add delete attribute values from dynamo DB.
FALLBACK: Sorry, I didn't understand that. Can you please repeat that?
ERROR: Sorry, I wasn't able to handle your last request. Could you say that again?
